Our days of distribution are every second and fourth Tuesdays of each month.  Our hours of distribution are 10:00 am until 2:00 pm, or until all food items are depleted.  Ample parking is available, and we have a number system in place, e g., each participant is given a number as they sign in to defray confusion as to distribution. a picture identification is required, and a brief Form must be completed,", "contactName": "Laura Middleton", "contactPhone": "843-312-2325", "contactEmail": "trustinginhim1953@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "Clothing Program", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 56, "regionName": "Lowcountry Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "5fb3a382-bcd1-479f-a540-43f27ab71b53.png", "website": "https://lowcountryfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["None-None (Call for Information)", "Tuesday 11:00 AM-1:00 PM", "Tuesday 11:00 AM-1:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
